lines.text: Good bye, everybody! Take care of the old ball field, Schroeder, I'm going to miss it.
The last time you went away, big brother, your team won three games in a row.

[Charlie Brown nibbles a bit on his eraser]
Don't chew on your eraser, Chuck. It bugs me.
[Charlie Brown drums his fingers on the desk]
Stop drumming your fingers on the desk, Chuck. That grosses me out.
[Charlie Brown sighs]
And don't hassle me with your sighs, Chuck.
[Charlie Brown breathes through his mouth and licks his fingers while turning a page]
Don't breathe through your mouth, Chuck. Don't lick your fingers when you turn the pages, Chuck.
[Charlie Brown is starting to get angry]
And don't scrap your feet on the desk.

[shouting - finally had enough - his shouting knocks Peppermint Patty off her seat]
WILL YOU STOP CRITICIZING ME?
How many times does 25 go into 75?
I'm awake! I'm awake! The answer is 12!
No, that is not correct.
The answer is 6!
3 is correct.
You contradicted me, Chuck! You made a fool out of me in front of the whole class.
Well 6 was the wrong answer. I had to say 3.
You don't like me do you, Chuck?
False! Why did you put down false, Chuck? The answer is true, Chuck! What's true is true! Put down true, Chuck, or I'll never speak to you again.
Charlie Brown?
Ma'am?
Is your partner giving you the answers?
Oh no, ma'am. She's not giving me the answers. Forcing, maybe, but not giving.

[in-flight meals are served]
Hey, Marcie, this is real nice!
It's a whole lot better than peanut butter sandwiches, sir.
What do you think they'll feed us in France?
Probably peanut butter on French bread, sir.

[Everybody in the car is eating sandwiches except for Charlie Brown, whose share of the loaf of bread got slammed into the hood of the car]
Boy, Chuck, this is great. That was real generous of you to feed your share to the car.
[Snoopy and Woodstock snicker]
Notice how well the car is running since you gave it some bread?
[Everybody breaks out laughing]

[Violette runs and accidentally knocks the candle, setting the chateau on fire]
Aaugh!
[Linus grabs Violette and runs to the window]
Help! Help, help! Help! Charlie Brown, Charlie Brown! Help, please! Help, help, help! Charlie Brown! Help! Help! Help, help!
[Charlie Brown wakes up]
Charlie Brown, Charlie Brown! Help! Help! Fire! Charlie Brown! Help, help! Fire!
Help! Help!
Help! Help!
Au secours! Au secours!

[Charlie runs]
Fire! Help! Fire!
Au secours! Au secours!
Fire, help! Fire! Help! Help! Fire!
[runs to the cafe for Snoopy and Woodstock]
Help! Fire at the chateau! Fire, fire! Help! Fire!
[Snoopy and Woodstock opens the door]
The chateau! Fire, help! Help! Help!
[heads to Pierre's house as Snoopy and Woodstock runs to the shed to get the hose]
Help, help! Help! Fire at the chateau! Fire, fire! Help!
[runs up to Pierre's house]
Fire, fire! Help! Fire! The chateau! Fire, fire! Help! The chateau! Fire, fire, fire!
[Pierre, Marcie and Peppermint Patty come out]
Somebody, help! The chateau is on fire! Somebody save the chateau! Fire, fire!
[runs off]

[to Patty and Marcie]
I must call the pompier!
[Marcie and Peppermint Patty runs off]
Jump, Linus, jump!

[runs up]
The pompier are on the way, is Linus safe?
Jump, jump! Jump Linus, jump!

[to Violette]
Jump? Are they crazy?
Bon voyage, Charlie Brown!
And don't come back!
Passport, please.
Y-Yes, sir. We're just passing through. We're on our way to France, sir. I have nothing to declare, sir. I throw myself at the mercy of the court!
We've only been two minutes and already he's embarrassing us.
If you know an answer, Chuck, and I don't, you tell me what it is. If I know an answer and you don't, I'll tell you what it is.
What happens if neither of us knows the answer?
We'll punt!
I'm worried about the Baron. Pierre said that he was a very mean man.

I don't have any idea what you're talking about, all I know is we had a terrible time. There was no one there to meet us, we got caught in the rain, the lightning scared us half to death, and we spent the night sleeping at the stable at the chateau.
[after Charlie Brown knocked down Peppermint Patty from being critized by her during a class, he and Peppermint Patty sits in the detention room]
Another fine mess you've got me into, Chuck.
Au secours! Au secours! Au secours! Au secours! Au secours! Ma petite Violette! Oh!
[Charlie Brown & Co. are at an English restaurant, waited upon by a waiter with a thick Cockney accent]
All right Guv'nor, you ready to order?
Can you help us with the menu?
For the gentlemen, I recommend the beef & kidney pie. The shepherds pie's rather nice for the ladies. A cheddar & pickle sandwich is rather toppo. What'll be your pleasure, mate?
What is...
[to Marcie]
What did he say?
Perhaps I should have studied *English*, not French.
What was the significance of "1066."
What happened in "1066"?
[pauses to ponder]
Well, it all depends. Is it a date or an address?
[smiles stupidly]
Did he say chateau? Surely they are not staying at the Chateau of the Bad Neighbor.
Yes they are, Mal Voisin.
But that is terrible! They cannot stay there!
Why not, Pierre?
They could be in great danger!
Danger?
No one, absolutely no one goes to that chateau, if you are from another country, that's even worse.
But Chuck received a letter from the chateau!
And, but that too is impossible, the baron would never allow such a thing.
The baron? What baron?
Come! We must see if we can do something!

[on the phone]
Êtes-vous sûr madame? Are you sure, Madam? Are you sure there is no answer? Alright thank you, merci.
[hangs up]
No answer? Shouldn't they have been there by now?
Well now what do we do?
There is nothing we can do. We must wait until morning and hope they are alright.
I don't think I like this, Sir. Chuck didn't fly all the way over here to get mugged.

[pounding on the chateau's door in a horrible lightning storm]
I can't believe it! There's no one home! Why would they invite us clear over here, and then not be home?
Nobody go to the Chateau of the Bad Neighbor, the Baron is recluse and hates everybody! He do not allow visitors.
Then why did they invite us? See? I got a letter from V. Honfleur, she invited us!
Violette? She's a ward of the Baron's, if she invited you, the Baron does not know about it. The Baron do not invite anyone. The Baron is a very violent person. He hates everybody.
That doesn't make sense. Why did she invite you, Charlie Brown?

[gathered around a fire]
I hope Chuck and Linus got into the chateau tonight, it's cold outside.

Nobody go into the Mal Voisin! I remember Violette often spoke of her grandmother and an American friend. During WWII many Americans were stationed around here, and in the Chateau Mal Voisin. I wish your friend will leave the chateau, he could be in danger!
[first lines]

[in a classroom]
Quiet, everybody! We have two new students here that I'd like to have you meet. They are exchange students from Europe. It is my great honor to introduce to you Babette and Jacques.

[after the rental car gets hit from behind]
Qu'est-ce que tu as dans la crâne? Oooh, les cornes! Qu'est-ce que tu veux que je fasse? Que dalle! Le pied de nez! Tu veux nous frotter?
